data.name: Warface - Chernobyl
data.detailed_description:
This update features a new Special Operation "Pripyat", two new weapon series, 38+ themed achievements, Christmas maps and more.

Special Operation "Pripyat"


The most awaited Special Operation is now live! It is the most epic and large-scale operation in the history of Warface. Developers have fully recreated one of the most atmospheric ghost towns on Earth. Brand new enemies, sudden dangers and unpredictable plot twists await.



This confrontation is a new page in the conflict between Warface and Blackwood. Face infected soldiers, Medusas, SED and more! Live through the boss encounter to tell the tale.



LEARN MORE

"Nuclear" weapon series


Nuclear power is yours for the taking with a brand new weapon series based on radioactive Pripyat. Stalk your prey and dispose of your foes in style! You will be able to obtain some “Nuclear” weapons and skins by completing special operation “Pripyat”. Killing foes with the “Nuclear” weapons will help you to unlock themed stripes!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
